name: Hoop Sim
description:
**Hoop Sim is a experimental game**

As of v0.11, you simply shoot basketball in a high-rise court.

Changes in v0.11

1. Redid the high-rise level

2. Added a Main menu

3. Animation tweaks

Controls 

E | Pickup ball

Hold Right Click | Aim ball

Left Click While Aiming | Shoot ball

Scroll Wheel Up | Increase shooting power

Scroll Wheel Down | Decrease shooting power
